body: Your luck increases the potency of your weapon attacks.
name: Lucky Strike
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Halflings/New Racial Rules/Halfling Feats/Lucky Strike

sections.body: Base attack bonus +5, adaptive luck racial trait, halfling.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: Spend a use of your adaptive luck racial trait to reroll the damage from a single weapon attack. You deal damage equal to the new damage roll, or the original roll, whichever is greater.
sections.name: Benefit
